welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Philipstown, the charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stewart Airport is where all commercial flights arrive and depart from.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stewart Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dutchess County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dutchess County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves smaller regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport offers a comfortable and convenient experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for VIP and chartered flights at Westchester County Apt Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
